alert.note: Alert for Western Okanogan County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 27 at 4:01AM PST until December 27 at 11:00AM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM PST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Additional snow accumulations up to 4 inches and additional ice accumulation less than one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Loup Loup Pass, Twisp, Conconully, Mazama, Winthrop, and Methow. * WHEN...Until 11 AM PST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Tuesday morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
